properties.title: Villette Cham
properties.abstract: Are you looking for a quiet place? We recomend you a visit of the Villette Park in Cham. Cham is the oldest community in Canton Zug and one of the loveliest lakeside locations in Central Switzerland.
properties.description: It is characterised by the magnificent Villette and "Hirsgarten" parks right by the lake, the idyllic countryside around the Frauenthal Convent, as well as the tradition-conscious, modern village surrounding St. Jacob's Church. An extensive network of footpaths and cycle-tracks take you across flat pre-Alpine countryside, down to the beautiful area of the Reuss valley and along the banks of Lake Zug.
properties.name: Zug Tourismus
